TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit UTF7Encoding extends System.Text.Encoding

summary.span: Represents a UTF-7 encoding of Unicode characters.

span.span: Represents a UTF-7 encoding of Unicode characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編碼是將一組 Unicode 字元轉換成位元組序列的處理程序。Encoding is the process of transforming a set of Unicode characters into a sequence of bytes. 解碼則是將編碼的位元組序列轉換成一組 Unicode 字元的程序。Decoding is the process of transforming a sequence of encoded bytes into a set of Unicode characters. Utf-7 編碼表示 Unicode 字元視為 7 位元的 ASCII 字元的序列。The UTF-7 encoding represents Unicode characters as sequences of 7-bit ASCII characters. 這種編碼方式時，支援特定它是必要的通訊協定，多半是電子郵件或新聞群組通訊協定。This encoding supports certain protocols for which it is required, most often email or newsgroup protocols. UTF-7、utf 不特別安全或穩固，現今大部分的系統允許的 8 位元編碼方式，因為通常應 utf-7 比 utf-8。Since UTF-7 is not particularly secure or robust, and most modern systems allow 8-bit encodings, UTF-8 should normally be preferred to UTF-7. > [!NOTE] > 不會提供錯誤偵測。 does not provide error detection. 基於安全性理由，應用程式應該使用， ，或並啟用錯誤偵測。For security reasons, the application should use , , or and enable error detection. 如需有關 UTFs 和所支援其他編碼，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的字元編碼](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md)。For more information about the UTFs and other encodings supported by , see [Character Encoding in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md). 方法會判斷多少個位元組會導致一組 Unicode 字元的編碼方式和方法會執行實際的編碼方式。The method determines how many bytes result in encoding a set of Unicode characters, and the method performs the actual encoding. 同樣地，方法會判斷字元數會導致解碼的位元組序列，而和方法會執行實際的解碼。Likewise, the method determines how many characters result in decoding a sequence of bytes, and the and methods perform the actual decoding. 對應至 Windows 字碼頁 65000。 corresponds to the Windows code page 65000. > [!NOTE] > Utf-7 編碼物件的狀態時，不會保留該物件會序列化並使用不同的.NET Framework 版本。The state of a UTF-7 encoded object is not preserved if the object is serialized and deserialized using different .NET Framework versions. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用編碼的 Unicode 字元字串，並將它們儲存在位元組陣列。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to encode a string of Unicode characters and store them in a byte array. 請注意，當回字串解碼的位元組陣列，不會遺失任何資料。Notice that when the byte array is decoded back to a string, no data is lost. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding Example/CPP/snippet.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding Example/CS/snippet.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding Example/VB/snippet.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立不允許使用選擇性字元的執行個體。This constructor creates an instance that does not allow optional characters. 呼叫建構函式相當於呼叫建構函式`allowOptionals`參數，並指定`false`該參數。Calling the constructor is equivalent to calling the constructor that takes an `allowOptionals` parameter and specifying `false` for that parameter. 如果執行個體允許使用選擇性字元，以對應的選擇性字元，而不是修改過的 base 64 字元編碼的 Unicode 字碼指標。If an instance allows optional characters, Unicode code points are encoded with a corresponding optional character instead of a modified base 64 character. 選擇性的字元是驚嘆號 ("！")，反斜線 ("\\")，垂直線 ("|")，雙引號 (""")，數字符號 （"#"）、 錢幣符號 （$）、 百分比符號 （"%"）、 連字號 ("&")、 星號 ("\*")，分號 （";"），向左角括號 ("\<」)，右角括號 (">")，左大括號 ("{")，右大括弧 ("}")，左側的大括號 ("[")，右方括號 ("]")，等號 （"="）、 at 符號 ("@")，抑揚音符 ("^")、 底線 ("_")，以及抑音符號腔調字 ("'")。The optional characters are exclamation point ("!"), backward slash ("\\"), vertical line ("|"), double quote ("""), number sign ("#"), dollar sign ("$"), percent sign ("%"), ampersand ("&"), asterisk ("\*"), semicolon (";"), left angle bracket ("\<"), right angle bracket (">"), left curly bracket ("{"), right curly bracket ("}"), left square bracket ("["), right square bracket ("]"), equal sign ("="), at sign ("@"), circumflex accent ("^"), underscore ("_"), and grave accent ("\`"). > [!NOTE] > 不會提供錯誤偵測。 does not provide error detection. 基於安全性理由，您的應用程式，建議您使用， ，或並啟用錯誤偵測。For security reasons, your applications are recommended to use , , or and enable error detection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立新執行個體，並顯示名稱的編碼方式。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance and display the name of the encoding. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor1 Example/CPP/ctor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor1 Example/CS/ctor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor1 Example/VB/ctor.vb#1)]

[!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor2 Example/CPP/ctor-boolean.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor2 Example/CS/ctor-boolean.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor2 Example/VB/ctor-boolean.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個物件是否相等，如果它們都是允許或不允許選擇性字元，而且如果其基礎和屬性相等。Two objects are equal if they both either allow or disallow optional characters, and if their underlying and properties are equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要計算確切的陣列大小需要儲存產生的位元組，應用程式會使用。To calculate the exact array size that requires to store the resulting bytes, the application uses . 若要計算最大陣列大小，應用程式應該使用。To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use . 方法通常可讓較少的記憶體配置而方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法傳回的字元陣列編碼所需的位元組數目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to return the number of bytes required to encode a character array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要計算所需的確切的陣列大小來儲存產生的位元組，應用程式會使用。To calculate the exact array size required by to store the resulting bytes, the application uses . 若要計算最大陣列大小，應用程式應該使用。To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use . 方法通常可讓較少的記憶體配置而方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 要轉換，例如，從資料流讀取資料的資料可能僅適用於循序區塊。Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, might be available only in sequential blocks. 在此情況下，或如果資料量太大，它必須分割成較小的區塊，應該使用應用程式或所提供方法或方法，分別。In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, the application should use the or the provided by the method or the method, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 不會提供錯誤偵測。 does not provide error detection. 無效的字元都會編碼為修改過的 base 64 字元。Invalid characters are encoded as a modified base 64 character. 基於安全性理由，您的應用程式，建議您使用， ，或並啟用錯誤偵測。For security reasons, your applications are recommended to use , , or and enable error detection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來編碼的字元範圍並將編碼的位元組儲存在位元組陣列中的項目範圍。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to encode a range of characters from a and store the encoded bytes in a range of elements in a byte array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要計算所需的確切的陣列大小若要儲存產生的字元，使用。To calculate the exact array size required by to store the resulting characters, use . 若要計算最大陣列大小，應用程式應該使用。To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use . 方法通常可讓較少的記憶體配置而方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 要轉換，例如，從資料流讀取資料的資料可能僅適用於循序區塊。Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, might be available only in sequential blocks. 在此情況下，或如果資料量太大，它必須分割成較小的區塊，應該使用應用程式或所提供方法或方法，分別。In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, the application should use the or the provided by the method or the method, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 不會提供錯誤偵測。 does not provide error detection. 當遇到無效的位元組時，一般都會發出的無效位元組。When invalid bytes are encountered, generally emits the invalid bytes. 如果一個位元組值大於 0x7F 十六進位，位元組值是以零擴充成 Unicode 字元，結果會儲存在`chars`終止陣列，以及任何移位序列。If a byte is larger than hexadecimal 0x7F, the byte value is zero-extended into a Unicode character, the result is stored in the `chars` array, and any shift sequence is terminated. 例如，如果要編碼的位元組是十六進位 0x81，產生的字元是 U + 0081。For example, if the byte to encode is hexadecimal 0x81, the resulting character is U+0081. 基於安全性理由，您的應用程式，建議您使用， ，或並啟用錯誤偵測。For security reasons, your applications are recommended to use , , or and enable error detection.

summary.span: Obtains a decoder that converts a UTF-7 encoded sequence of bytes into a sequence of Unicode characters.

span.span: Obtains a decoder that converts a UTF-7 encoded sequence of bytes into a sequence of Unicode characters.

returns.span: A that converts a UTF-7 encoded sequence of bytes into a sequence of Unicode characters.

span.span: A that converts a UTF-7 encoded sequence of bytes into a sequence of Unicode characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將序列的位元組的區塊轉換成循序區塊中的字元，以類似的方式這個類別的方法。The method converts sequential blocks of bytes into sequential blocks of characters, in a manner similar to the method of this class. 不過，維護呼叫，因此它可以正確解碼位元組序列跨越區塊之間的狀態資訊。However, a maintains state information between calls so it can correctly decode byte sequences that span blocks. 也會保留尾端位元組的資料區塊的結尾，並在下一步 的解碼作業中使用尾端位元組。The also preserves trailing bytes at the end of data blocks and uses the trailing bytes in the next decoding operation. 因此，和適合用於網路傳輸和檔案作業，因為這些作業經常要處理的資料，而不是完整的資料流區塊。Therefore, and are useful for network transmission and file operations, because those operations often deal with blocks of data instead of a complete data stream. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以取得轉換 UTF-7、utf 解碼器編碼成字元序列的位元組。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to obtain a decoder to convert the UTF-7 encoded bytes into a sequence of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetDecoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetDecoder Example/CPP/getdecoder-.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetDecoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetDecoder Example/CS/getdecoder-.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetDecoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetDecoder Example/VB/getdecoder-.vb#1)]

public: override System::Text::Encoder ^ GetEncoder();
override this.GetEncoder : unit -> System.Text.Encoder

summary.span: Obtains an encoder that converts a sequence of Unicode characters into a UTF-7 encoded sequence of bytes.

span.span: Obtains an encoder that converts a sequence of Unicode characters into a UTF-7 encoded sequence of bytes.

returns.span: A that converts a sequence of Unicode characters into a UTF-7 encoded sequence of bytes.

span.span: A that converts a sequence of Unicode characters into a UTF-7 encoded sequence of bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將序列的位元組的區塊轉換成循序區塊中的字元，以類似的方式方法。The method converts sequential blocks of bytes into sequential blocks of characters, in a manner similar to the method. 不過，維護呼叫，因此它可以正確解碼位元組序列跨越區塊之間的狀態資訊。However, a maintains state information between calls so it can correctly decode byte sequences that span blocks. 也會保留尾端位元組的資料區塊的結尾，並在下一步 的解碼作業中使用尾端位元組。The also preserves trailing bytes at the end of data blocks and uses the trailing bytes in the next decoding operation. 因此，和適合用於網路傳輸和檔案作業，因為這些作業經常要處理的資料，而不是完整的資料流區塊。Therefore, and are useful for network transmission and file operations, because those operations often deal with blocks of data instead of a complete data stream. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以取得將字元序列轉換成 UTF-7、utf 編碼器編碼的位元組序列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to obtain an encoder to convert a sequence of characters into a UTF-7 encoded sequence of bytes. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetEncoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetEncoder Example/CPP/getencoder-.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetEncoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetEncoder Example/CS/getencoder-.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetEncoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetEncoder Example/VB/getencoder-.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的值方法不適合用於區別其中從另一個物件。The value returned by the method is not suitable for distinguishing one object from another. 如果您的應用程式需要唯一的雜湊程式碼，它應該覆寫方法。If your application needs a unique hash code, it should override the method.

param.name: charCount
param.span: The number of characters to encode.

summary.span: Calculates the maximum number of bytes produced by encoding the specified number of characters.

span.span: Calculates the maximum number of bytes produced by encoding the specified number of characters.

returns.span: The maximum number of bytes produced by encoding the specified number of characters.

span.span: The maximum number of bytes produced by encoding the specified number of characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要計算所需的確切的陣列大小來儲存產生的位元組，應用程式會使用。To calculate the exact array size required by to store the resulting bytes, the application uses . 若要計算最大陣列大小，應用程式應該使用。To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use . 方法通常可讓較少的記憶體配置而方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 是最壞情況的數字，包括目前所選最壞的情況。 is a worst-case number, including the worst case for the currently selected . 如果後援會選擇使用可能很大的字串、可以傳回較大的值。If a fallback is chosen with a potentially large string, can return large values. 在大部分情況下，這個方法會傳回對小型字串合理的數字。In most cases, this method returns reasonable numbers for small strings. 針對大型的字串，您可能選擇使用極大的緩衝區，少數的情況下，更合理的緩衝區已超出攔截錯誤。For large strings, you might have to choose between using very large buffers and catching errors in the rare case that a more reasonable buffer is exceeded. 您也可以在不同的方法使用，請考慮或。You might also want to consider a different approach using or . UTF-7、utf ASCII 資料，每個字元，一個位元組編碼效率很高時就非常沒有效率的其他資料。While UTF-7 is very efficient at encoding ASCII data, one byte per character, it is extremely inefficient for other data. 如上述位壞的情況下處理。As remarked above, deals with a worst case. 如果要編碼的資料大部分都是 ASCII，尤其是 ASCII 字元的叢集在一起，而且 UTF-7、utf 遠比這個方法所傳回的數字有效率建議。If the data to be encoded is largely ASCII, and especially if the ASCII characters cluster together, UTF-7 is significantly more efficient than the number returned by this method suggests. 沒有任何關聯。 has no relation to . 如果您的應用程式需要類似的函式，以搭配，它應該使用。If your application needs a similar function to use with , it should use . > [!NOTE] > `GetMaxByteCount(N)` 不一定是相同的值`N* GetMaxByteCount(1)`。`GetMaxByteCount(N)` is not necessarily the same value as `N* GetMaxByteCount(1)`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法傳回的編碼指定的字元數所需的位元組數目上限。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to return the maximum number of bytes required to encode a specified number of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetMaxByteCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetMaxByteCount Example/CPP/getmaxbytecount-int32.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetMaxByteCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetMaxByteCount Example/CS/getmaxbytecount-int32.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetMaxByteCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetMaxByteCount Example/VB/getmaxbytecount-int32.vb#1)]

span.span: Decodes a range of bytes from a byte array into a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要轉換，例如，從資料流讀取資料的資料可能僅適用於循序區塊。Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, might be available only in sequential blocks. 在此情況下，或如果資料量太大，它必須分割成較小的區塊，應該使用應用程式或所提供方法或方法，分別。In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, the application should use the or the provided by the method or the method, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 不會提供錯誤偵測。 does not provide error detection. 當遇到無效的位元組時，一般都會發出的無效位元組。When invalid bytes are encountered, generally emits the invalid bytes. 如果一個位元組值大於 0x7F 十六進位，位元組值是以零擴充成 Unicode 字元，結果會儲存在`chars`終止陣列，以及任何移位序列。If a byte is larger than hexadecimal 0x7F, the byte value is zero-extended into a Unicode character, the result is stored in the `chars` array, and any shift sequence is terminated. 例如，如果要編碼的位元組是十六進位 0x81，產生的字元是 U + 0081。For example, if the byte to encode is hexadecimal 0x81, the resulting character is U+0081. 基於安全性理由，您的應用程式，建議您使用， ，或並啟用錯誤偵測。For security reasons, your applications are recommended to use , , or and enable error detection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將字串編碼成位元組陣列，然後再將位元組解碼回字串。The following code example encodes a string into an array of bytes, and then decodes the bytes back into a string. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.getstring#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.getstring/CPP/getstring.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.getstring#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.getstring/CS/getstring.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.getstring#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.getstring/VB/getstring.vb#1)]
